U

updateUser(User) - Method in interface de.htwberlin.kba.gr7.vocabduel.user_administration.export.UserService
Updates user data by a given user object.
updateUserPassword(User, String, String, String) - Method in interface de.htwberlin.kba.gr7.vocabduel.user_administration.export.AuthService
Updates a user's password if the current password is correct and the new password is both valid and matching the confirm password.
UserService - Interface in de.htwberlin.kba.gr7.vocabduel.user_administration.export
Service for managing users and user data beyond authentication purposes (for auth, incl. registration and login, please check AuthService).
